fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Soulsteal: For every 2 players you Kill, permanently expand your Hand Size by 1. 
- Blazing: When you empty your Hand for the first time, immediately draw 5 cards.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Conjure: Gain a non-Special card of your choice. [5 uses, 1 CD] 
- Splitstrike: Pick a non-Special Attacking card in your Hand. Triple it (without modifiers) and send all attacks toward a single player. [1 use, Unique]
- Summon: Draw 2 cards of your choice at the end of this phase. Replaces your regular draw. Cannot be affected by Replenish! Max 1 Special card. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique]
